summary: THE CONSUMER HAD THE POWER STEERING RACK REPLACED PRIOR TO RECEIVING A RECALL NOTICE FOR THE RACK AND PINION STEERING GEAR ASSEMBLY.  THE CUSTOMER SERVICE MANAGEMENT INFORMED THE CONSUMER  HIS VEHICLE DIDN'T QUALIFY AND DID NOT HAVE SYMPTOMS OF THE RECALL.  THE CONSUMER WAS REFUSED REIMBURSEMENT AND STILL WISHES TO RECEIVE.  OTHER PROBLEMS ARE AS FOLLOWED:  OIL PAN LEAKED-REPLACED GASKET ASSEMBLY, AND THE END SEALS OF THE RACK AND PINION LEAKED, WHICH WERE  REPLACED.  MR  SCC  *JB
